data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,973,173 lost people in  Arbil, Iraq have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arbil, Iraq
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Arbil, Iraq.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Arbil.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Arbil. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gurani, Sarli people.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Arbil, Iraq from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Arbil, Iraq.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the state of Arbil, Iraq has a population of 2,000,000.

We estimate Arbil has 4,091 people who might know Jesus, 22,736 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,973,173 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 488 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Arbil, Iraq, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
